eligibility: Students pursuing International curriculum must note that eligibility is according to AIU stipulations:
why_choose: Why choose this course? Translate the theory of economics, psychology into practice. Establishes career in organizations Enhanced ability for problem solving and decision making Builds and enhances knowledge of life skills and industry. Emphasizes interdisciplinary  connections Internships and service learning opportunities
what_learn: What you will learn? Practicing professionals and academicians as faculty members enable easier and comprehensive coverage of the curriculum Field and industrial visits are an integral part of the course curriculum. Internships of various durations across the program exposes the students to bridge between Industry and academia also fostering the research environment. Students have the opportunity to undertake a Research Projects Students are encouraged to choose Multidisciplinary courses offered by other deaneries that promote an interdisciplinary thinking and thought. Students will also be engaged in laboratory work for the subjects involving experimental curriculum.
modules: Modules Introduction to Psychology Brain Behaviour Multidisciplinary courses Year 1 Personality and Individual Differences Microeconomics & Macroeconomics Statistical Methods & Data analysis Basic Cognitive Psychology Experimental Psychology Service Learning Year 2 Developmental Psychology Basic Social Psychology Psychology Internship Psychological disorders Health Psychology Introduction to Forensic Psychology Year 3 School and Educational Psychology Introduction to Neuropsychology Positive psychology/ Media psychology Law and Ethics in Psychology Psychological interventions Counseling Psychology Year 4 Psychodiagnostic Assessments Data Analysis and Management Lab Advance research methods, Research skill lab  and Research manuscript in Psychology
career: Career prospects Establishes career in organizations Enhanced ability for problem solving and decision making. Builds and enhances knowledge of life skills and industry. Emphasizes interdisciplinary connections Engage in Research projects
